alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:21AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brunswick, central Columbus and northeastern Horry Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1120 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whiteville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Makatoka, Freeland, Hallsboro, Cherry Grove, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Exum, Bughill, Sidney, Clarendon, Williams, Pireway, Dulah and Ash. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
